thread.title: Edelman Was Mic’d Up For His Ridiculous Super Bowl Catch And Never Had Any Doubt He Caught It
thread.title_full: Edelman Was Mic’d Up For His Ridiculous Super Bowl Catch And Never Had Any Doubt He Caught It

author: Feitelberg
title: Edelman Was Mic’d Up For His Ridiculous Super Bowl Catch And Never Had Any Doubt He Caught It
text:
Edelman Was Mic’d Up For His Ridiculous Super Bowl Catch And Never Had Any Doubt Ge Caught It Feitelberg | 


I always wonder if these guys are trying to convince themselves or the refs when they start making the “catch” signal after quitting a call, but still pretty cool to hear Edelman immediately saying he caught it. I’ve had farts that I had to think about what really happened more than Julian Edelman had to think about an historic catch. Feitelberg |
